data.title: Christina Aguilera, A Famous Actress And An Eye Candy Icon
data.meta_description: Free Essay: Christina Aguilera, a famous actress and an eye candy icon for millions of people all over the world. ”Christina Aguilera was born in Staten...
data.text:
Christina Aguilera, a famous actress and an eye candy icon for millions of people all over the world. ”Christina Aguilera was born in Staten Island, New York to Xavier Aguilera and Shelly Moraine. Her father was in the US army which meant that they had to move from place to place and her mother was a violinist and a pianist.” (“Christina Aguilera” 2016. 1). In some reading that have been wrote people wrote that her father was abusive to her family. Christina has had one child in her life and it is a boy and his name is Max Liron Bratman. She also has siblings in her family brothers are Michael and Casey, and sisters are Rachel, Stephanie. Christina also has a spouse that she is not with anymore but is still married to him his name is …show more content…

Christina was bullied when she would go to school at both of the school she went to. She was bullied because of her singing talent and being on television when being in school and starting to become a star.

Christina always has had a passion for singing and enjoyed singing as a child. She started singing as a child and then started to audition for parts in T.V. shows. Christina at a young age liked singing “Since her five years of age, Christina had known all the songs from the "Sound of Music", all of which she sang at the neighborhood block parties”, (Christina Aguilera Biography” And Life Story. 1). When she started her career it had an impact on her life everything changed when people started to hear her sing. People loved her voice and how she went about her singing career she really made a mark on people. Christina started her acting career by being on the cast of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse with Brittney Spears. Then she went and did a movie in 2010 the movie was a big hit “Burquest” she was the main actor in the movie and did a great job. In the movie it really showed how high her voice can go and how great she can hit the notes and was a chance for her actressing career too. Christina has some trivia facts about her she did do a nude picture shot for the rolling stones which people did make high criticizing about her after she did that. Then when she kiss Madonna on stage in front of a lot of people. She also gave a tribute to James Brown at the grammys
